title: Comparing CrewAI vs. AutoGen for Building AI Agents
title1: Comparing CrewAI vs. AutoGen for Building AI Agents
title2: Comparing CrewAI vs. AutoGen for Building AI Agents
description: CrewAI and AutoGen are two notable frameworks in the AI agent landscape. We will cover the key differences, example implementations and share our recommendations if you are starting out in agent-building.
author: Lina Lam
